1034240930491113478.text:
Too many men read toxic masculinity as something tantamount to "toxic testicles." It is not.

The term refers to the social norms & expectations that bind us to a narrow, dated model of how to be a man. And those norms usually make us harmful to the people around us, hence toxic.
